text: Clarence William Joseph Tolson (17 November 1911 - 24 June 1989) was an Australian rules footballer who played with Collingwood in the Victorian Football League (VFL). == Notes == == External links == * *Clarrie Tolson's profile at Collingwood Forever Category:1911 births Category:1989 deaths Category:Australian rules footballers from Victoria (Australia) Category:Collingwood Football Club players
title: Clarrie Tolson
